thread.title: Iain Kerr
thread.title_full: Rapid Formations reviewed by Iain Kerr

author: Iain Kerr
title: Iain Kerr
text: I used Rapid Formations to setup an limited company for me. They provided all the possible options I probably would not have even thought about, making the whole process very powerful yet straightforward. This is the first time I have used them, but the whole process took no time at all, and within 24hours the company had been established with all the necessary paperwork emailed to me. I can certainly recommend them if you want an easy way to set up a new limited company, and I would use them again if the need arises.
